faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be effective immediately, with adjusted billing on your next cycle.
faq.question2: What happens if I exceed my monthly requests?
faq.answer2: If you exceed your monthly request limit, you can continue using the service at a pay-as-you-go rate or upgrade to a higher plan.
faq.question3: Is there a free trial available?
faq.answer3: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans so you can test the features before committing.
faq.question4: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer4: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will remain until the end of your current billing period.
